home1.message1: shiri ne na gane hoto wanda kamfanin CLINICAGRO ya kirkira, wanda aka tsara shi domin nemo ainihin AIKATA CIKIN KAMARON KAMARON wanda har yanzu yake zama mai wahala.
home1.message2: yana baka damar bincika abin da ka gani, don tafiya cikin sauri, don sanya ƙasa daidai da kayayyakin Made In Kamaru da aka nuna a manyan kantunan ƙasar.
home1.message3: Mun baku dama ga wadannan bayanan:
home1.message4: Adireshin manyan kantunan da zaku samu wadannan kayan
home1.message5: matsayin wadannan kayayyakin a cikin manyan kantunan;
home1.message6: nisan kilomita da farashin samun dama ga waɗannan manyan kantunan dangane da matsayinku.
home1.message7: Kawai yi rijista da lambar WHATSAPP don samun damar duk waɗannan bayanan daga hoto ko kalma.
